headline: BXP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: BOSTON, December 18, 2024--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.98 per share of common stock for the period October 1, 2024 to December 31, 2024, payable on January 30, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on December 31, 2024.

raw.headline: BXP Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
raw.summary: BOSTON, December 18, 2024--BXP, Inc. (NYSE: BXP), the largest publicly traded developer, owner, and manager of premier workplaces in the United States, announced today that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.98 per share of common stock for the period October 1, 2024 to December 31, 2024, payable on January 30, 2025 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on December 31, 2024.
